name: RDF #13 - Sinistra
description:
"Stop using your left hand, it's the hand of the Devil!"
These words from my paternal grandmother have been haunting me as a kid. Why was I different? Was I possessed? Was everything created using that hand the result of some mysterious dark power?
I dedicate this piece to all the left-handed artists: if you believe that your art might be cursed, you know who to blame, or thank.

LiDAR scanned in Augmented Reality by Fivos Doganis (@fdoganis) as a part of the Reality Distortion Fields Series, exploring how machines sense the world and questioning our own human senses.
